name: Clockwork Assassin
description: The Clockwork Assassin is a Medium Construct known for its precision and mechanical design, incorporating various gadgets to enhance its combat effectiveness.
memorable: Its ability to deliver critical strikes against surprised foes makes it highly dangerous in stealthy scenarios.
goals: To carry out stealthy assassinations and escape undetected.
relations: Possible association with other constructs, or designed by a skilled artificer.
environment: Typically found in urban areas or locations where stealth and agility are advantageous.
strengths: Immunity to lightning and poison, and advantageous in surprise situations.
weaknesses: Vulnerability to psychic damage that adversely affects its combat capabilities.
attacks: Uses two rapier strikes in a multiattack, potentially delivering powerful sneak attacks and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Assassinate ability, granting critical hits against surprised enemies.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, aiding it in low-light conditions.
skills: Possesses high proficiency in Stealth, allowing it to infiltrate and ambush effectively.
additional_information: Immunities to conditions like charmed and frightened.
Explodes upon destruction, dealing area damage.
Capable of moving through narrow spaces by disassembling.
Magic Resistance grants advantage against spells.
High mobility through climbing makes it versatile.
test_queries: mechanical assassin that performs sneak attacks
poisonous damage dealer disguised as machinery
stealthy clockwork creature with critical hit advantage
efficient assassin construct with disassembly ability
